name: Ultima VIII: Pagan
description:
Ultima VIII: Pagan is a RPG game developed by Origin Systems. It was originally released in 1994. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Ultima VIII: Pagan on PC.
It was produced by Richard Garriott. It was directed by Mike McShaffry. It was scored by Kirk Winterrowd and Nenad Vugrinec.
